jaloliddin.title: Jaloliddin Kadirov
jaloliddin.text: Chief Executive Officer – a manager with experience in leadership and executive positions in the banking and finance sector, specializing in small and medium-sized business relations. Possesses deep knowledge in corporate and SME financing, loan recovery, and monitoring.

jamoliddin.title: Jamoliddin Abdullaev
jamoliddin.text: Chief Risk Officer – an experienced specialist with 20 years of work in banking and finance, including senior and executive management. Skilled in SME financing, operations, risk management, treasury, and financial planning. Held leadership roles in both state and commercial banks.

mirzo.title: Mirzo Bozorov
mirzo.text: Chief Financial Officer – a leader with 10 years of experience in financial management, project management, and product development within the banking and finance system. Focuses on the efficiency of banking products and the delivery channels of digital banking services. Holds an international financial certification.

mirgulom.title: Mirgulom Dosmuhammedov
mirgulom.text: Chief Accountant with over 15 years of experience in the banking sector of Uzbekistan, specializing in banking and microfinance. Has deep knowledge of accounting and tax reporting, with strong attention to compliance with regulatory requirements.

about.heading: About Us
about.intro1: Impact Finance is a microfinance organization aimed at expanding financial inclusion and supporting economic stability. We provide fair, transparent, and reliable financial solutions for small business owners, women entrepreneurs, youth, and rural residents.
about.intro2: Our main goal is to create opportunities for those excluded from the traditional financial system. Therefore, through microloans and other financial services, we encourage social and economic development.

values.trust: Reliability – we always serve our clients honestly and responsibly.
values.transparency: Transparency – we provide clear and understandable terms and conditions in all processes.
values.sustainability: Sustainability – we strengthen community well-being through financial support.
values.collaboration: Collaboration – we develop long-term, mutually beneficial partnerships.

about.closing: For us, the success of every client is the success of Impact Finance.

biznes.title: Microloan Business
biznes.foiz: 42%  Note: Rates may vary depending on the client’s situation.
talablar: Must be a resident of Uzbekistan
Business owner’s age between 20 and 60
At least 6 months of business experience
No overdue debts of more than 30 days in the past year
Profitable business indicators
Business must not violate legislation and/or internal rules of IMPACT FINANCE LEADERS

biznesPlus.title: Microloan Business+
biznesPlus.foiz: 46%  Note: Rates may vary depending on the client’s situation.
talablar: Must be a resident of Uzbekistan
Business owner’s age between 20 and 60
At least 6 months of business experience
No overdue debts of more than 30 days in the past year
Profitable business indicators
Business must not violate legislation and/or internal rules of IMPACT FINANCE LEADERS

oson.title: Microloan Easy
oson.foiz: 49%  Note: Rates may vary depending on the client’s situation.
talablar: Must be a resident of Uzbekistan
Age between 20 and 60
Credit rating of C or higher
No current outstanding debts
Client or guarantor must be registered in Tashkent city (including region)
Income must not violate legislation and/or internal rules of IMPACT FINANCE LEADERS

ishonch.title: Microloan Trust
talablar: Must be a resident of Uzbekistan
Age between 20 and 60
Client’s written income statement
Credit bureau rating of C or higher
No current outstanding debts
Client or guarantor must be registered in Tashkent city (including region)
Income must not violate legislation and/or internal rules of IMPACT FINANCE LEADERS

calculator.title: Loan
calculator.description: Use the calculator on the website to select the amount and term, and calculate the approximate monthly payment.
calculator.noteText: For detailed information about amounts, terms, and repayments, please contact any of our branches or call our phone number.
calculator.info: We help entrepreneurs and businesses turn their dreams into reality through financial support. With our credit services, you can move confidently towards reliability, stability, and new opportunities.

contact.title: Contacts
contact.subtitle: If you have any questions or requests, please feel free to contact us
contact.address: Tashkent city, Shaykhontokhur district, Orda Makhalla, Labzak street, house 2a

form.title: Feedback form for complaints and suggestions
form.consent: By submitting this form, you agree to the processing of personal data.

hero.description: With IMPACT FINANCE, find a reliable partner to achieve your financial goals. Take advantage of fast, convenient, and secure credit services.

services.title: Why should you choose us?

cards.title: Favorable loan conditions
